name: study_planner
description: Study Planner is a clean and intuitive productivity app designed to help students organize and track their daily study goals. The app features a modern dashboard layout with a SliverAppBar for dynamic scrolling effects, a prominent “Today’s Focus” card to highlight key subjects or goals, and a scrollable task list for managing study sessions efficiently. With its elegant UI and simple navigation, Study Planner provides a smooth user experience, combining functionality and design to boost focus and productivity throughout the day.
